properties.description: The institution that owns the digital object.
properties.title: Owning institution

properties.description: The institution submitting the digital object for ingest.
properties.title: Submitting institution

properties.description: The name of a logo to display with the object in addition to the logo of the owning institution.
properties.title: Other logo

properties.description: The type of title.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: Any initial article that should not be used for filing or database searches.
properties.title: Non Sort

properties.description: A word, phrase, character, or group of characters that contains the remainder of the title information after the title proper.
properties.title: Subtitle

properties.description: The place a single item holds in a collection or series of works, for example, a volume or series number.
properties.title: Part Number

properties.description: The title of an individual item in a collection or series of works; should not be used for subtitle.
properties.title: Part Name

properties.description: The language of the main title, usually the same language as the text.
properties.title: Language

properties.description: The controlled vocabulary from which the title was taken.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: Additional text associated with the element if needed for display purposes. The preferred text with its capitalization should be included, but not delimiters such as colons.
properties.title: Display label

properties.description: Use to link the title to the same title in a different language or script.
properties.title: Alternate Representation Group

properties.description: Use to link the title to the same title in a different language or script.
properties.title: Name/title group

properties.description: "IID" is the local item identifier.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: A unique standard number or code that distinctively identifies the resource. Valid IID characters are limited to alphanumeric, underscore, hyphen, period, and parentheses.
properties.title: Identifier

properties.description: The type of identifier. Suggested values include, but are not limited to, those specified in Standard Identifier Source Codes.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: A standard number or code that distinctively identifies the resource.
properties.title: Identifier

properties.description: What type of name is recorded.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: A full personal name (when not divided into Family and Given name), full corporate/meeting name,or corporate/meeting name segment.
properties.title: Name Part

properties.description: The given (forename) name segment of a personal name.
properties.title: Given name

properties.description: The family name (surname) segment of a personal name.
properties.title: Family name

properties.description: Title and/or enumeration associated with a name, such as Jr., II, etc.
properties.title: Terms of Address

properties.description: Date(s) associated with a personal name.
properties.title: Dates

properties.description: An organization associated this person at the time that the resource was created.
properties.title: Affiliation

properties.description: Textual role term from MARCRelator terms vocabulary.
properties.title: Role (text)

properties.description: Coded role term from MARCRelator terms vocabulary.
properties.title: Role (code)

properties.description: The controlled vocabulary from which the name was taken.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: Use to link the name to the same name in a different language or script.
properties.title: Alternate representation group

properties.description: Use to link a name to a uniform title.
properties.title: Name/title group

properties.description: Open Researcher and Contributor IDentifier.
properties.title: ORCID

properties.description: A local name identifier. Use this field to link content models to the Person Entity.
properties.title: Local NameIdentifier
